name: Gilpin Arrivals Ultimate
description: Enterprise-grade arrival intelligence platform for Gilpin Hotel & Lake House. Transforms PMS arrival PDFs into a live, interactive operational hub across six departmental dashboards. Features AI-powered guest data refinement (Gemini 2.5 Pro), structured Booking Stream with two-column facility display, bespoke Itinerary Generator, real-time cross-device sync (Firebase Fleet Sync), and a premium dual-theme UI with Framer Motion animations.
